text: When Moses returned to his people, angry and sorrowful, he said: you succeeded me badly after me, were you rushing your Masterâ€™s order? He threw down the tablets and took his brother by the head dragging him toward himself. He (Aaron) said: son of my mother, the people weakened me and almost killed me, so do not make the enemies happy about me, and do not put me with the wrongdoing group
